page.title: 11Shops and shopping
page.content: The{main places}identified for{major {household shopping are Newbury,Wantage and{Chaddleworth}in the locality. People will go{further afield to {Oxford,Swindon,Reading and London for less essential shopping.{The majority of people{go to}either{Newbury or {Wantage}for their{groceries.}The{shops they{use most}are{Tesco,Sainsbury, {Normans and Waitrose.}The shop at {Chaddleworth}is only a{small village {post office,general store and filling {station. 41%}of the people go to {Normans,}about{34%}go to{Sainsbury,14% go to{Gateway,7%}go to{Waitrose}and about{3%}go to{Marks and Spencer.}The little village shop in Chaddleworth is handy when you've run out of sugar or something.{Occasionally}people will drive to the{hypermarket, Savacentre, just west of{Reading.
